seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' without 'Senior' designation, but requires 3+ years experience which typically indicates mid-level position

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' and role focuses on BI/DW projects, reporting, and visualization

sub_specialty.evidence: Role specifically focuses on BI/DW projects, reporting, and visualization using Cognos, indicating traditional data warehousing and business intelligence focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring responsibilities, or direct reports - purely individual contributor role focused on technical execution

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms mentioned equally as nice-to-have: AWS, Google Cloud Platform, and Azure with no single platform emphasized as primary

secondary_clouds.evidence: Since primary cloud is 'multi' with all three major platforms mentioned equally, no secondary clouds to list

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on reporting, visualization, and traditional BI/DW projects suggests batch processing rather than streaming or real-time

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned (Airflow, Spark, dbt, etc.) - traditional BI tools like Cognos may have built-in scheduling but not explicitly discussed

storage_layer.evidence: Emphasis on BI/DW, reporting, and visualization with Cognos indicates traditional data warehousing approach rather than data lakes or lakehouse architectures

remote_restriction.evidence: Work model stated as 'onsite' with specific location requirement 'Pune, Maharashtra, India' indicating must be in India

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India, indicating Indian timezone (IST) focus with no other timezone requirements mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in specific location (Pune) requires candidates to already be in or relocate to Pune, Maharashtra, India

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and role is based in India, so H1B (US work visa) sponsorship would not apply to this India-based position

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: India-based position with no mention of student visa support, and US student visas (OPT/CPT) would not apply to India-based employment

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization restrictions mentioned for this India-based position, suggesting openness to all eligible candidates

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM Consulting position with full-time employee structure and benefits package typically indicates W2 employment rather than contractor roles

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, learning budget, or other compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No discussion of career paths, growth opportunities, advancement potential, or career development mentioned in the posting

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, working with senior staff, learning opportunities, or collaborative environment

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion, advancement, career growth, or progression to senior roles

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, exploring different positions, or lateral moves within the organization

career_tracks_available.evidence: No discussion of different career paths (IC track, management track, specialist track, architect track) or career progression options

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Required Technical And Professional Expertise' and 'Preferred Technical And Professional Experience' with balanced must-have vs nice-to-have requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined role focused specifically on Data Engineer-Business Intelligence with clear responsibilities around BI/DW, reporting, and visualization - not a multi-role hybrid position

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3+ years experience requirement is reasonable for mid-level BI/Data Engineer role with appropriate technical skills listed for the position level
